summary: This document is an invoice summary from J Epstein & Co Inc dated February 5, 1999, detailing transportation charges for a FedEx shipment. The invoice includes charges for special handling and transportation, totaling $30.70, and indicates that the charges were initially billed to a different payor.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is associated with J Epstein & Co Inc, which is the sender of the invoice for transportation services.

locations: 350 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL 33480
keyFacts: Total charges on the invoice amount to $30.70.
The invoice references a FedEx shipment picked up on December 16, 1998.
The original address for the package was 350 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL.
The invoice indicates that charges were initially billed to a different payor.
